11 class SegmentationClient
12 {
13 public:
14  SegmentationClient(ros::NodeHandle* nodeHandle, std::string cloud_topic, std::string segmentation_service);
15  void cloudCallback(const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2& msg);
16  void publishClouds();
17 private:
18  ros::NodeHandle nh_;
19  std::string cloud_topic_ ;
20  std::string segmentation_service_;
21  ros::Subscriber sub_;
22  ros::Publisher table_cloud_pub_;

27 
28 SegmentationClient::SegmentationClient(ros::NodeHandle *nodeHandle, std::string cloud_topic, std::string segmentation_service)
29  :nh_(*nodeHandle),cloud_topic_(cloud_topic),segmentation_service_(segmentation_service){
30  sub_ = nh_.subscribe(cloud_topic_, 1, &SegmentationClient::cloudCallback, this);
31  table_cloud_pub_ = nh_.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>("table",10);
32  object_cloud_pub_ = nh_.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>("objects",10);
33 }
34 
35 void SegmentationClient::cloudCallback(const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2& msg){
36  ros::ServiceClient client = nh_.serviceClient<sq_fitting::segment_object>(segmentation_service_);
37  sq_fitting::segment_object srv;
38  srv.request.input_cloud = msg;
39  if(client.call(srv)){
40  table_cloud_ros_ = srv.response.plane_cloud;
41  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB> segmented_objects_cloud;
42  for(int i=0;i<srv.response.object_cloud.size();++i){
43  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZRGB> tmp;
44  pcl::fromROSMsg(srv.response.object_cloud[i], tmp);
45  float r = static_cast<float> (rand())/static_cast<float>(RAND_MAX);
46  float g = static_cast<float> (rand())/static_cast<float>(RAND_MAX);
47  float b = static_cast<float> (rand())/static_cast<float>(RAND_MAX);
48  for(int j=0;j<tmp.points.size();++j){
49  pcl::PointXYZRGB temp_point;
50  temp_point.x = tmp.points.at(j).x;
51  temp_point.y = tmp.points.at(j).y;
52  temp_point.z = tmp.points.at(j).z;
53  temp_point.r = r * 255;
54  temp_point.g = g * 255;
55  temp_point.b = b * 255;
56  segmented_objects_cloud.points.push_back(temp_point);
57  }
58  }
59  segmented_objects_cloud.width = segmented_objects_cloud.points.size();
60  segmented_objects_cloud.height =1;
61  segmented_objects_cloud.is_dense = true;
62  pcl::toROSMsg(segmented_objects_cloud, object_cloud_ros_);
63  object_cloud_ros_.header.seq = 1;
64  object_cloud_ros_.header.frame_id = msg.header.frame_id;
65  object_cloud_ros_.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
66  publishClouds();
67  }
68 }
69 
70 void SegmentationClient::publishClouds(){
71  table_cloud_pub_.publish(table_cloud_ros_);
72  object_cloud_pub_.publish(object_cloud_ros_);
73 }
74 
75 
76 int main(int argc, char **argv)
77 {
78  ros::init(argc, argv, "segmentation_client");
79  ros::NodeHandle nh;
80  std::string segmentation_service, cloud_topic;
81  nh.param("segmentation_client/segmentation_service",segmentation_service, std::string("segmentation_service"));
82  nh.param("segmentation_client/cloud_topic", cloud_topic, std::string("/camera/depth_registered/points"));
83  SegmentationClient client(&nh, cloud_topic, segmentation_service);
84  ros::spin();
85  return 0;
86 }
